page_subtitle: Find answers to common questions or contact our support team for help.
contact_subtitle: Didn't find your answer? Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you soon.

faqs.q: How do I reset my password?
faqs.a: Go to your profile page, click 'Change password', and follow the instructions.

faqs.q: How do I upgrade my plan?
faqs.a: Visit the Plans & Pricing page and click 'Upgrade' on your desired plan.

faqs.q: How do I use the AI Chatbot?
faqs.a: Go to the AI Chatbot page from the sidebar and start chatting!

faqs.q: Can I share my progress with friends?
faqs.a: Yes! Use the social sharing options on your dashboard.
Fill out the support form below or email us at support@nutrimind.com.
Yes, your data is securely stored and never shared without your consent.
